TestCase.name: testMultiFiltersMultipleAggregatesShouldPushdown[mode = stream]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1), sum(age) filter (where id > 1) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $0]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))], age=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

GroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(*) AS EXPR$0, SUM(age) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[>(id, 1)], project=[age], metadata=[]]], fields=[age])

TestCase.name: testMultiFiltersMultipleAggregatesShouldPushdown[mode = batch]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1), sum(age) filter (where id > 1) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $0]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))], age=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_COUNT(count1$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_COUNT(*) AS count1$0, Partial_SUM(age) AS sum$1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[>(id, 1)], project=[age], metadata=[]]], fields=[age])

TestCase.name: testSingleFilterMultiAggregagesShouldNotPushdown[mode = stream]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1), sum(age) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))], age=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

GroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(*) FILTER $f0 AS EXPR$0, SUM(age) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Calc(select=[(id > 1) IS TRUE AS $f0, age]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[id, age], metadata=[]]], fields=[id, age])

TestCase.name: testSingleFilterMultiAggregagesShouldNotPushdown[mode = batch]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1), sum(age) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))], age=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_COUNT(count1$0) FILTER count1$0 AS EXPR$0, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_COUNT(*) FILTER $f0 AS count1$0, Partial_SUM(age) AS sum$1]) +- Calc(select=[(id > 1) IS TRUE AS $f0, age]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[id, age], metadata=[]]], fields=[id, age])

TestCase.name: testMultiFiltersShouldNotPushdown[mode = stream]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1), sum(age) filter (where id > 5) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $2]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))], age=[$2], $f2=[IS TRUE(>($0, 5))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

GroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(*) FILTER $f0 AS EXPR$0, SUM(age) FILTER $f2 AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Calc(select=[(id > 1) IS TRUE AS $f0, age, (id > 5) IS TRUE AS $f2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[id, age], metadata=[]]], fields=[id, age])

TestCase.name: testMultiFiltersShouldNotPushdown[mode = batch]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1), sum(age) filter (where id > 5) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0], EXPR$1=[SUM($1) FILTER $2]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))], age=[$2], $f2=[IS TRUE(>($0, 5))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_COUNT(count1$0) FILTER count1$0 AS EXPR$0, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_COUNT(*) FILTER $f0 AS count1$0, Partial_SUM(age) FILTER $f2 AS sum$1]) +- Calc(select=[(id > 1) IS TRUE AS $f0, age, (id > 5) IS TRUE AS $f2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[id, age], metadata=[]]], fields=[id, age])

TestCase.name: testMultiFiltersShouldPushdown[mode = stream]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1) FROM MyTable where age < 3

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($2, 3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

GroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(*) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[and(<(age, 3), >(id, 1))]]], fields=[id, name, age])

TestCase.name: testMultiFiltersShouldPushdown[mode = batch]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1) FROM MyTable where age < 3

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($2, 3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_COUNT(count1$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[and(<(age, 3), >(id, 1))], aggregates=[grouping=[], aggFunctions=[Count1AggFunction()]]]], fields=[count1$0])

TestCase.name: testSingleFilterShouldPushdown[mode = stream]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
GroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(*) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[>(id, 1)]]], fields=[id, name, age])

TestCase.name: testSingleFilterShouldPushdown[mode = batch]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(*) filter (where id > 1) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT() FILTER $0]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS TRUE(>($0, 1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_COUNT(count1$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[>(id, 1)], aggregates=[grouping=[], aggFunctions=[Count1AggFunction()]]]], fields=[count1$0])
